attributes.action: Remove Ken Bates from footballing matters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After following football for a large period of my life, I have realised that there are some rogue characters involved in British sport. One of these is Ken Bates who I believe is damaging the footballing economy which has been proven whilst incharge of both Leeds United and Chelsea FC. I am requesting that this man is removed from Footballing matters to maintain the high standard of sport in this country.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
